mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.customer_id AS "customerId", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.area AS "area", a.complete_address AS "completeAddress", a.postcode AS "postcode", a.name AS "name", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.is_default AS "isDefault"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM shop_shipping_address a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_shipping_address( id, customer_id, province, city, area, complete_address, postcode, name, mobile, is_default ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{customerId}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{completeAddress}, #{postcode}, #{name}, #{mobile}, #{isDefault} )
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_shipping_address SET customer_id = #{customerId}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, area = #{area}, complete_address = #{completeAddress}, postcode = #{postcode}, name = #{name}, mobile = #{mobile}, is_default = #{isDefault} WHERE id = #{id}
